summary: To attain a position in public and/or legal administration or similar field.

experience.title: Customer Service Specialist III
experience.description: Provided customer service to Health Marketplace consumers; validated and authenticated accounts; assisted enrollment in health insurance; informed about accounts and updates; assisted with applying and renewing coverage; set up and validated family members as authorized representatives.

experience.title: Mgmt. Specialist & MWBE Liaison
experience.description: Created and entered B1184s into the Division of Budget grants system; processed MWBE waiver forms; maintained relationships with project managers and department heads to ensure MWBE compliance; utilized the Contract Management System with Access and Excel; liaised with Executive Chambers for waiver status; met with PMs and department heads to discuss MWBE goals; prepared and submitted monthly & quarterly MWBE Utilization Reports.

experience.title: Deputy City Clerk
experience.description: Directed public inquiries; managed daily operations for issuing marriage licenses, certifications, reservoir fishing permits; issued dog licenses and handled payments; managed mail; prepared agendas and minutes; uploaded agendas/minutes to site; accepted legal service notices; managed daily cash and deposits; entered data into Excel.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Managed grant contract processing and compliance; verified grant-related documents; coordinated with program representatives; managed grant contracts/renewals for state and municipal entities; trained staff in Contract Management/Auditing; created training materials; audited grant contracts in SFS; monitored temps for contract compliance; created purchase orders and entered data into Access; coordinated with program teams.

experience.title: Keyboard Specialist I
experience.description: Maintained Inmate Appeals in the NYS Division of Parole; compared information in FPMS/PARMIS and related systems; maintained inmate records; verified parole hearing dates; communicated with inmates/attorneys; opened and processed briefs; organized files for Board review; handled inquiries.

experience.title: Information Technical Assistant
experience.description: Managed user access forms for correctional facilities; adjusted access for position changes; installed Lotus Notes; provided file share access; used Citrix and MS Office to support users.

education.degree: Masters of Public Administration, Government & Policy
Masters of Science, Criminal Justice - Administration of Justice & Security
Bachelors of Science, Business Organizational Management
